title: The Agent Native Company — Rick Blalock, Agentuity

rawLines.text: Hi, my name is Rick from Agentuity and
today I'm going to talk to you about
agent native companies or AI native
companies. What that means you hear a
lot of that right now. What does it mean
and uh what are some of the core
attributes and things like that? So, so
imagine if you will, you walk into the
